enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: This section is currently closed to registration.  Please contact the department directly with any questions.
title: JOUR JOUR 321-0-21 Storytelling: Magazine & Feature Writing

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course introduces students to narrative storytelling for print, digital and mobile forms of magazines and explores different writing techniques. Students will produce several pieces including a well-researched and reported 2,500-3,000-word feature story suitable for publication in a commercial outlet. Students will closely examine and deconstruct stellar narrative from notable journalists and also review and workshop their own pieces. The course aims to challenge students to deliver memorable works of narrative storytelling and inspire them to continue their growth as reporters and writers.

subject: JOUR
